ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: I am a professional with several years of experience developing software and wide domain of different programming languages such as: Golang, JavaScript, Node.js, PHP, C#, java, c++, fox pro, in addition to knowledge of design and database development using: MsSQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQLite.
ABOUT_ME.UNIVERSITY: Universidad Nacional del Centro del Perú

CONTACT.TITLE: GET IN TOUCH
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Although I'm not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
